recipesJson.name: Backwoods Lemonade
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: This is a refreshing berry lemonade with the highlight of this simple recipe being Forest Fruit. Its great to go as is. The flavors may meld and smooth out a bit after a day. Feel free to add a tiny bit of sweetener if you wish. I do not think the recipe requires it at all.

reviews.text: the simplicity of this recipe is what got me i have been vaping it for about a month now i wrote it down when i first started mixing without a name just the % and what not but im glad its Ed's recipe cause this is straight fire ... opened my eyes because i was sleeping on forrest fruit it was with my first order ever and now i find myself experimenting with it more because of this recipe
This is as good as it gets for a simple mix, tried the previous iteration with 0.75% FA  Lemon Sicily, and it's the bomb. I'm sure it's even better now with FE Lemon.

The flavor combinations in this recipe are great.  Forrest Mix and lemonade are a match made in heaven. But it was definitely designed for somewhat muted atomizers.  For example, I tested it in an Elevate and it pretty solid.  That's obviously a tough balance when you're mixing for tart lemonade, but this one's just a little too harsh on good attys.

Fantastic. Shake and vape, just don't let it sit too long. After around a week the lemonade aspect starts to drop off significantly, though that is an issue with LA Lemonade more than anything. This is usually what I mix for friends when they want something "summery." Outstanding simple recipe. 0.5% WS23 makes a welcome addition here as well, to make it more of a beverage vs. a candyesque flavor. Either way works well though.

I had to let it steep about 5 days for the FF to start to feel more like berries than dark mustiness, however I tend to have issue with FF fresh so take that in to account. Once I let it steep the berries were the forefront of the mix with lemon/lemonade taking a seat at the back of the bus making this more of a berry mix with hints of lemonade.

I am really starting to love what lemon Sisley does for fruits, I didn't care for the Forest mix when I sfted it, but it comes out tasting great in this simple yet delightful mix right off the shake, good job :)

The flavors are fantastic in this recipe, but for some reason I found it a bit dry/harsh to vape on more than just occasionally. If it was smoother/wetter It would easily be a 4-5 star mix for me. I guess maybe I might not be a lemonade guy?
Holy balls, I'm not much of a lemonade vaper but I thought I'd give this a shot as a taster for forest fruits and this is some good stuff.  Kudos on this.
Very simple, yet very refreshing. Plan on making A LOT of this!!
Excellent recipe!! The lemon and the berry blend really well. Just the right mix of tart and sweet. I have been doing so many creams, desserts, and bakeries, this fruity vape really hits the spot.
